Article Title: Behind spin-heavy Champions Trophy squad: Need to bat deep, tired pitches
Article Text:
Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav and Varun Chakravarthy. (PTI Photo)

Poll What Do You Think About India’s Spin-Heavy Squad for the Champions Trophy? A Risky Decision Due to Limited Pace Options A Smart Move to Adapt to Dubai’s Conditions

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

'We don't look at averages and stats': Gautam Gambhir on sending Axar Patel at No. 5

NEW DELHI: Eyebrows were raised when India announced five spinners in the team for the ICC Champions Trophy . Historically, the pitches in Dubai do not overly favour spinners. However, the venue has also just got done with the month-long ILT20 league which may have left the pitches tired and more amenable to spin. Predominantly, though, India’s spinner-heavy squad was chosen to lengthen the batting lineup, TOI has learnt.The trend emerging from head coach Gautam Gambhir ’s tenure is the inclination to have more allrounders in the lineup across formats. Gambhir has been vocal about the need to bat deep. Seambowling allrounders are a rarity at the moment. Hence, Washington Sundar too has made the cut along with Axar Patel and Ravindra Jadeja Interestingly, it was Gambhir who insisted on having Shivam Dube back in the ODI scheme of things by adding him to the list of non-travelling reserves, say insiders.Gambhir is someone who prefers to have more options in the playing XI. More allrounders give him the chance to be flexible. If India advance in the tournament, spinners are likely to play a greater role.The idea, according to those in the know of developments, is simple — play two steady finger-spinners who can bat well to complement either Kuldeep Yadav or Varun Chakravarthy . Kuldeep and Chakravarthy are seen as genuine strike options. If the pitches at the start look like they can produce big runs, one might see Chakravarthy in the XI ahead of Kuldeep. The majority of Chakravarthy’s wickets have come while the batters have been looking to push the scoring rate. Kuldeep is seen as someone who can deceive the batter in the air and lure him into a false shot, like he did against England in the last ODI in Ahmedabad on Wednesday.Also See: Champions Trophy Schedule 2025 There are other factors too. India have played two Asia Cups at the venue over the last seven years and never played more than two frontline spinners in the XI.Jasprit Bumrah’s absence and Mohammed Shami being rusty after a long injury layoff has played a part in India picking a spin-heavy attack which can compensate for the inexperience of the two new pacers, Harshit Rana and Arshdeep Singh. It will be interesting to see how India’s campaign unfolds on the Dubai pitches, which usually sport a layering of grass to prevent the surface from cracking up.
Article Summary: The trend emerging from head coach gautam gambhir ’s tenure is the inclination to have more allrounders in the lineup across formats. The idea is to play two steady finger-spinners who can bat well to complement either kuldeep yadav or varun chakravarthy.

Article Title: Taylor Swift avoids "publicly supporting" Blake Lively and fans have figured out the reason behind it
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Taylor Swift Has “Distanced” Herself From Blake Lively Because Of This Reason, Fans Say



Blake Lively Was Not Spotted With Taylor Swift At Super Bowl 2025



Taylor Swift, the billionaire pop star, has been in the news since she got booed at the Super Bowl last weekend when Travis Kelce’s team, the Kansas City Chiefs lost the trophy to the Philadelphia Eagles. Away from the Super Bowl drama, the pop star has also found herself involved in the legal drama between Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni. But now, the reason why Taylor Swift has “distanced” herself from Blake Lively is pretty clear, according to fans.Taylor Swift has remained pretty silent about the whole controversial situation and is yet to make an official announcement about it. It seems like fans have found the reason behind it.A fan took to X and wrote, “The fact that Taylor Swift, huge advocate of the womens movement, didnt support bestie Blake Lively speaks volumes. If anyone would support, know and have proof that Blake was harrassed it would be Taylor Swift. Talks, calls, texts...Yet Taylor didn't support it. Hmmm”Another fan wrote, “If my bestfriend who made me godmother to her children was in a legal battle over sexual harassment & retaliation, I would be standing ten toes down with her. I would not abandon her. The fact that Taylor Swift distanced herself from Blake Lively is damning enough.”While it is not confirmed why Taylor Swift has not been spotted recently with her best friend, Blake Lively, fans are pretty convinced that this is the reason behind it.For the unversed, Blake Lively had accused Justin Baldoni of harassment and Justin filed a counter lawsuit against Blake Lively and her husband Ryan Reynolds accusing them of defamation and trying to take over control of their blockbuster movie, It Ends With Us. Taylor Swift was named by Justin Baldoni in the lawsuit as he felt Blake Lively tried to “use” Taylor Swift’s power and influence to gain control of the movie.Many fans also expected to see Taylor Swift and Blake Lively at the Super Bowl held last weekend but Blake was nowhere to be found at the stadium. This was in complete contrast to the 2024 Super Bowl when Blake Lively was spotted cheering on Travis Kelce as she stood next to Taylor Swift. The two were also spotted hugging each other when the Kansas City Chiefs won the trophy last year.A few days ago, a source revealed to Page Six that “Taylor really wishes Blake hadn’t dragged her into this whole situation.” This might be true considering how Taylor Swift has avoided being spotted with Blake Lively.With the Chiefs losing the Super Bowl, both Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift have been trolled but have remained silent.Also Read: Hailee Steinfeld reacts as Josh Allen gets asked out on a date during their appearance at NFL Honors
Article Summary: Taylor swift has been in the news since she got booed at the super bowl last weekend when travis kelce’s team, the kansas city chiefs lost the trophy to the philadelphia eagles. The pop star has also found herself involved in the legal drama between blake lively and justin baldoni.

Article Title: Champions Trophy 2025 All Team Squads: Full Players List and Updates
Article Text:
BCCI Photo

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

How Mohammed Shami’s horoscope foretells India's success in Champions Trophy

INDIA SQUAD:

PAKISTAN SQUAD:

Champions Trophy: Will India and South Africa clash in another ICC final?

AUSTRALIA SQUAD:

TRAVELLING RESERVE:

NEW ZEALAND SQUAD:

BANGLADESH SQUAD:

AFGHANISTAN SQUAD:

ENGLAND SQUAD:

SOUTH AFRICA SQUAD:

TRAVELLING RESERVE:

NEW DELHI: The ICC Champions Trophy is set to begin in Pakistan on February 19, marking its return after an eight-year gap. The marquee tournament will feature the top eight men’s ODI teams competing for the prestigious title. The teams are divided into two groups, with the top two from each group advancing to the semifinals.Group A includes hosts Pakistan, India, New Zealand, and Bangladesh, setting the stage for intense subcontinental clashes. Meanwhile, Group B features Australia, England, South Africa, and Afghanistan.India will kick off their ICC Men's Champions Trophy 2025 campaign against Bangladesh on February 20, followed by a high-stakes encounter against Pakistan on February 23. Their final Group A match will be against New Zealand on March 2.The 15-match tournament will be played over 19 days across Pakistan and the UAE. Under the hybrid model, India will play all their matches in Dubai, including the semifinal and final, should they qualify.Led by Rohit Sharma, India enter the competition with a strong squad, featuring eight players from their victorious T20 World Cup 2024 campaign.However, the team has suffered a setback with pace spearhead Jasprit Bumrah ruled out due to injury. Young pacer Harshit Rana has been named as his replacement, while Varun Chakaravarthy comes in for Yashasvi Jaiswal.Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul, Rishabh Pant, Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Washington Sundar, Kuldeep Yadav, Harshit Rana, Mohd. Shami, Arshdeep Singh, Ravindra Jadeja, Varun Chakaravarthy.Defending champions Pakistan, led by wicketkeeper-batter Mohammad Rizwan, will look to defend their 2017 title. The squad includes key players from their previous Champions Trophy-winning campaign, such as Fakhar Zaman, Babar Azam, and Faheem Ashraf. However, they will be without opener Saim Ayub, who has been ruled out due to injury.Mohammad Rizwan (c), Babar Azam, Fakhar Zaman, Kamran Ghulam, Saud Shakeel, Tayyab Tahir, Faheem Ashraf, Khushdil Shah, Salman Ali Agha, Usman Khan, Abrar Ahmed, Haris Rauf, Mohammad Hasnain, Naseem Shah, Shaheen Shah Afridi.ODI world champions Australia will enter the tournament with a depleted squad, as several senior players have withdrawn. Captain Pat Cummins, along with key pacers Josh Hazlewood and Mitchell Starc, have pulled out, leading to Steve Smith taking over the captaincy.Additionally, the Aussies will be without all-rounder Mitchell Marsh. In their absence, newcomers Ben Dwarshuis, Spencer Johnson, and Tanveer Sangha have been called up to bolster the squad.Steve Smith (c), Sean Abbott, Alex Carey, Ben Dwarshuis, Nathan Ellis, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Aaron Hardie, Travis Head, Josh Inglis, Spencer Johnson, Marnus Labuschagne, Glenn Maxwell, Tanveer Sangha, Matthew Short, Adam Zampa.Cooper Connolly.New Zealand’s squad saw a late change after pacer Ben Sears was ruled out due to a hamstring injury, with Jacob Duffy named as his replacement. Mitchell Santner, captaining the Kiwis in his first ICC tournament, will lead a squad that blends youth and experience.With veteran pacers Trent Boult and Tim Southee unavailable, the onus will be on Matt Henry, Lockie Ferguson, and young quick Nathan Smith to step up.Mitchell Santner (c), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Lockie Ferguson, Matt Henry, Tom Latham, Daryl Mitchell, Will O’Rourke, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Jacob Duffy, Nathan Smith, Kane Williamson, Will Young.Meanwhile, Bangladesh, under the leadership of Najmul Hossain Shanto, will look to improve on their semi-final finish from 2017.Veteran campaigners Mahmudullah and Mushfiqur Rahim bring experience and stability, while promising youngsters Nahid Rana and Rishad Hossain add dynamism to the squad.Nazmul Hossain Shanto (c), Soumya Sarkar, Tanzid Hasan, Tawhid Hridoy, Mushfiqur Rahim, MD Mahmud Ullah, Jaker Ali Anik, Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Rishad Hossain, Taskin Ahmed, Mustafizur Rahman, Parvez Hossai Emon, Nasum Ahmed, Tanzim Hasan Sakib, Nahid Rana.Afghanistan made a late change to their squad, with young spinner Nangyal Kharoti replacing the injured Allah Ghazanfar.The team retains experienced stars Rashid Khan and Mohammad Nabi, while Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran bolster the top order.Hashmatullah Shahidi (c), Ibrahim Zadran, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Sediqullah Atal, Rahmat Shah, Ikram Alikhil, Gulbadin Naib, Azmatullah Omarzai, Mohammad Nabi, Rashid Khan, Nangyal Kharoti, Noor Ahmad, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Farid Malik, Naveed Zadran. Reserves: Darwish Rasooli, Bilal SamiEngland’s squad features the return of Joe Root, while Tom Banton comes in as a replacement for the injured Jacob Bethell.Led by Jos Buttler, their pace attack will be spearheaded by Jofra Archer and Mark Wood, with Gus Atkinson and Jamie Overton providing support.The ECB statement read, "Scans on a left groin injury have confirmed that England Men's batter Ben Duckett is fit and available for the ICC Champions Trophy. Duckett sustained the injury while fielding during the first innings of England's third ODI defeat to India in Ahmedabad last Wednesday."Jos Buttler (c), Jofra Archer, Gus Atkinson, Jacob Bethell, Harry Brook, Brydon Carse, Ben Duckett, Jamie Overton, Jamie Smith, Liam Livingstone, Adil Rashid, Joe Root, Saqib Mahmood, Phil Salt, Mark WoodSouth Africa suffered a setback with Anrich Nortje ruled out due to injury, prompting the inclusion of Corbin Bosch.Kagiso Rabada spearheads the Proteas' pace attack, while Temba Bavuma, Aiden Markram, Rassie van der Dussen, and Heinrich Klaasen form the backbone of their batting lineup.Temba Bavuma (c), Tony de Zorzi, Marco Jansen, Heinrich Klaasen, Keshav Maharaj, Aiden Markram, David Miller, Wiaan Mulder, Lungi Ngidi, Kagiso Rabada, Ryan Rickelton, Tabraiz Shamsi, Tristan Stubbs, Rassie van der Dussen, Corbin Bosch.Kwena Maphaka
Article Summary: Icc champions trophy begins in pakistan on february 19. Top eight men's odi teams will compete for the prestigious title. Group a includes hosts pakistan, india, new zealand, and bangladesh. Group b features australia, england, south africa, and afghanistan. Mitchell santner captaining the kiwis in his first icc tournament.

Article Title: NBA Buyout Rumors: Dallas Mavericks reportedly attempted pursuit of $177 million All-Star to form Big 3 with Anthony Davis and Kyrie Irving
Article Text:
Anthony Davis (Image via Getty)

Dallas Mavericks

All-Star

Ben Simmons

“League sources say that Dallas had interest in joining the buyout market bidding for Ben Simmons, who swiftly joined the LA Clippers after negotiating his release from the Brooklyn Nets and held appeal to the Dallas Mavericks as a small ball center,”

Anthony Davis at the Mavericks Press Conference (Image via Getty)

“The Mavericks, though, sit less than $200,000 away from the NBA's first luxury-tax apron … even after Davis waived his trade kicker upon learning that the Lakers were dealing him to Dallas for Doncic.”

Thehave been making bold moves to reshape their roster after trading Luka Doncic for Anthony Davis . Adding Caleb Martin from the Philadelphia 76ers was another step, but the team isn’t done yet. According to NBA insider Marc Stein, the Mavericks recently tried to sign formerbefore he joined the Los Angeles Clippers.Stein reported on The Stein Line that Dallas showed interest in Simmons during the buyout market.Stein wrote.Ben Simmons, a three-time All-Star, could have provided the Mavericks with much-needed playmaking and defensive versatility. While he hasn’t been the same dominant force since his Philadelphia 76ers days, his ability to facilitate and guard multiple positions would have been valuable for Dallas.However, financial constraints played a role in the Dallas Mavericks ’ inability to secure Simmons. Stein noted,Despite missing out on Ben Simmons, the Mavericks’ interest signals their intent to remain active in the buyout market. With the trade deadline behind them, Dallas is likely to explore additional options to bolster their roster for a playoff push. The team’s success will depend on who becomes available and how quickly they can integrate new pieces.Simmons’ move to the Clippers also sets up a potential postseason showdown between the two teams. If Dallas can stay healthy and add the right pieces, they could make a deep playoff run and possibly return to the NBA Finals.For now, the Dallas Mavericks’ pursuit of Ben Simmons highlights their determination to build a contender around Anthony Davis and Kyrie Irving . Fans will be watching closely to see what moves come next.Also read: NBA Buyout Rumors: Dallas Mavericks eyeing ex $30 million San Antonio Spurs forward to bolster roster with Anthony Davis and Kyrie Irving Let us know if you feel that former All-Star Ben Simmons would have been a good fit for the Mavs. Do you think Simmons could have been a strong supporting player for Davis and Irving? Leave your opinions in the comments down below.
Article Summary: The dallas mavericks tried to sign ben simmons before he joined the los angeles clippers. Nba insider marc stein reported that dallas showed interest in simmons during the buyout market. The mavs are currently less than $200,000 away from the nba's first luxury-tax apron.

Article Title: Is Caitlin Clark in the NBA All-Star 3-Point Contest 2025? All you need to know about the Indiana Fever phenom's participation in this year's All-Star weekend
Article Text:
Caitlin Clark (Image via Imagn)

Caitlin Clark

NBA All-Star 3-Point Contest 2025

"She wants her first 3-point contest to be at WNBA All-Star in Indianapolis this summer,"

Caitlin Clark. (Image via Matthew Putney)

, the Indiana Fever ’s rising star, will not be participating in theevent, despite receiving an invitation. The decision has sparked conversations among fans and analysts, as Clark continues to make an impressive impact on her fans with her WNBA career.The NBA All-Star weekend has long been a platform for collaboration between the NBA and WNBA, with stars from both leagues competing in events. Last year, the league featured a thrilling one-on-one 3-point contest between Golden State Warriors Stephen Curry and New York Liberty’s Sabrina Ionescu. This year, discussions included adding Caitlin Clark and Klay Thompson to the mix for a potential two-on-two showdown. However, the idea was ultimately scrapped, and Clark declined her invitation.Clark’s decision stems from her desire to make her first 3-point contest appearance at the WNBA All-Star weekend .her representatives stated. This summer’s WNBA All-Star weekend holds special significance, as it will be hosted in Indianapolis for the first time, with Clark expected to be a central figure.Last year, Caitlin Clark skipped the NBA All-Star 3-Point Contest 2025, citing the need for rest after transitioning directly from college basketball to the professional league. This year, she’s focused on making her mark in the WNBA’s marquee event.Clark’s rookie season has been nothing short of impressive. She won the Rookie of the Year award, averaging 19.2 points, 8.4 assists, and 5.7 rebounds per game. She also led the league in 3-pointers made per game (3.0) and assists per game (8.4), solidifying her status as one of the WNBA’s most promising talents.Fans might be sad to miss Clark's shooting prowess during the NBA All-Star 3-Point Contest 2025, but her choice shows how dedicated she is to the WNBA and its rising stature. Clark's attendance at the WNBA All-Star weekend will surely enhance the occasion and allow her to display her skills on a platform she has chosen to prioritize as the league continues to grow.Also read: NBA All-Star 3-Point Contest 2025: All rules, detailed format, scores, judges, and more For now, all eyes will be on Indianapolis this summer, where Caitlin Clark is set to shine.
Article Summary: Caitlin clark has declined an invitation to participate in the nba all-star 3-point contest 2025. The indiana fever star wants to make her first 3-point contest appearance at the wnba all-stars weekend. Last year, she skipped the event, citing the need for rest after transitioning from college basketball to the professional league.

Article Title: Boston Celtics Star Jaylen Brown and WNBA's Kysre Gondrezick End Their Romance: What Went Wrong?
Article Text:
Credits: Getty Images

Boston Celtics’ Jaylen Brown and WNBA Star Kysre Gondrezick Break Up

Boston Celtics star Jaylen Brown has split. The NBA champion confirmed his relationship with WNBA free agent Kysre Gondrezick in July 2024, setting the internet ablaze. Their romance blossomed into the spotlight after Gondrezick was spotted cheering him on during the Celtics' triumphant championship parade.In July of the year 2024, the player from the Boston Celtics made a notable appearance on the red carpet of the ESPY Awards alongside Kysre Gondrezick, who is a free agent in the WNBA, thus officially confirming their romantic relationship. This revelation came after she was spotted enthusiastically supporting him during the Celtics' triumphant victory in the NBA championship the previous month. Their joint appearance at the awards ceremony served to bolster the swirling rumors about their dating status. Furthermore, fans quickly recognized Gondrezick's presence as she stood by Brown's side, celebrating during the parade held in Boston to honor the Celtics' championship win that took place in June 2024.Although the official explanation for the breakup has not been made public, insiders indicate that a variety of factors may have played a role in this decision. The overwhelming media attention that often surrounds high-profile athletes can be incredibly taxing, leaving very little opportunity for personal space and privacy. Additionally, the rigorous schedules that professional athletes face, which include demanding training routines, extensive travel commitments, and relentless media scrutiny, can also place considerable stress on even the most resilient of relationships.Prior to her romance with Brown, Gondrezick was involved with former NBA player Kevin Porter Jr. That relationship unfortunately ended with a disturbing incident involving alleged assault. Porter Jr. was arrested and later pleaded guilty to charges stemming from the incident.ALSO READ: NBA Star Lamar Odom’s Own Father Wanted to End His Life?: Khloe Kardashian Exposes Major Details It's understandable that Gondrezick would prioritize her own well-being and seek a healthy and supportive partner. Perhaps the pressures of their respective careers and the constant media scrutiny proved to be too much for the couple to navigate. One thing's for sure: the off-court drama surrounding Jaylen Brown is sure to keep fans talking for weeks to come.
Article Summary: Boston celtics star jaylen brown and wnba free agent kysre gondrezick have split. The nba champion confirmed his relationship with the wnba star in july 2024. Their romance blossomed into the spotlight after she was spotted cheering him on during the celtics' triumphant championship parade.

Article Title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are set to make their social debut, with the couple potentially walking a red carpet soon
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift might make their red carpet debut at the Met Gala

Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift, who have been dating since summer 2023, may be making their red carpet debut this year. They could have attended major red carpet events like Swift's Eras Tour film premiere in Los Angeles in October 2023 and the Grammys and VMAs in 2023 and 2024, but decided against them due to scheduling or unknown reasons. With Swift's Eras Tour over and Kelce having a break before the next football season, this event might be the perfect opportunity for them to make their red carpet debut.Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift have been busy with social engagements and busy schedules since dating in 2023. Taylor's Eras Tour and Travis' role in helping the Kansas City Chiefs win three consecutive Super Bowls make them as busy as any celebrity couple.Swift and Kelce, who are off the road after a disappointing Super Bowl loss, are expected to attend the Met Gala red carpet on May 5. People Magazine reports that they will make headlines due to their fashion expertise and previous attendance at the event. Both Swift and Kelce are expected to make a statement at the event.“As part of their R&R time, it's thought the couple could finally make an official red carpet appearance together — with the Met Gala earmarked as their first potential event together,” the Mirror reported of Kelce and Swift. “So far Swift and Kelce, who began dating in 2023, have struggled to align their schedules to step out together at an event.”Swift and her boyfriend Kelce have decided to attend the Met Gala, a first for Swift, as she hasn't attended the event with any of her boyfriends since 2016. This follows their 2023 invitation to the Oscars, where they also declined. “… However the Met Gala isn't until May, and with Swift not planning to tour this year it's thought she and Kelce could turn out at the red carpet event together. The event would be a ‘relationship first' for the pair as they anticipated to step out together.”Also Read: “Negotiate with terrorists”: Saturday Night Live producer branded Travis Kelce's girlfriend Taylor Swift a terrorist Swift has been supporting Kansas City Chief Kelce after the Super Bowl 59 loss, but was unable to cheer on Kelce. Now, they plan to take time to enjoy each other. Swift is rumored to work on new music this year, possibly a new album, and is discussing a smaller-scale tour in 2026, similar to the Eras Tour.
Article Summary: Travis kelce and taylor swift may make their red carpet debut at the met gala. The couple have been dating since summer 2023. They could have attended major red carpet events like swift's eras tour film premiere in los angeles in october 2023, but decided against them due to scheduling or unknown reasons.

Article Title: Team USA emerged victorious in a chaotic match, with Tampa Bay forward Jake Guentzel contributing two goals
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Jake Guentzel's performance against Canada was a highlight of the tournamen

Tampa Bay Lightning forward Jake Guentzel scored his second goal in the 4 Nations Face-off Tournament , tying the game 1-1 against Canada in Montreal. Both teams entered the matchup with one win each, with Canada beating Sweden 4-3 in overtime and the Americans beating Finland 6-1 on Thursday.Jake Guentzel scored the game-tying goal in the first period of their 4 Nations Face-Off duel with Canada, sealing a 3-1 win for the United States, as he was present to pump his fists after the shot sailed into Canada's empty net. “It’s the best time to play as a player. It’s pretty easy to get up for these games,” Guentzel said. “Yeah, if you’re not getting excited for this, you shouldn’t be playing right now so this is just a lot of fun.”Guentzel's performance against Canada was a highlight of the tournament, with the entire Bell Centre crowd supporting him and his teammates. His efforts helped the U.S. secure a spot in the championship game, which will be held at TD Garden in Boston. “Not surprised at all. I watched it firsthand for a lot of years,” said U.S. coach Mike Sullivan, who coached Guentzel with the Pittsburgh Penguins from 2016-24.“Jake is a high-stakes player. He plays his very best when it means the most and I don't think there's a stage big enough for him. He thrives in these types of environments. He's such a smart hockey player. He plays on both sides of the puck. I'm not surprised at all.”Guentzel, a key player for the Penguins, contributed significantly to their Stanley Cup Playoffs victory in 2016-17. He scored 21 points, 13 goals, and eight assists, and has 33 game-winners in the regular season. However, he was not widely recognized during his peak. “Yeah, I’m just obviously very fortunate to play on this stage and at this level,” he said. “Obviously playing with some superstar linemates (center Auston Matthews and right wing Jack Hughes) to make it easy on myself but just try to be at my best at this moment.”Also Read: “Respect the anthems”: Canada's captain Sidney Crosby reacts to the booing of the United States National anthem
Article Summary: Jake guentzel scored the game-tying goal in the first period of their 4 nations face-off duel with canada. His efforts helped the u.s. secure a spot in the championship game, which will be held at td garden in boston.

Article Title: Heisman Trophy winner Travis Hunter has been listed as a defensive back for the NFL scouting combine
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Travis Hunter, a two-way star, has been listed as the quarterback for the NFL combine

Travis Hunter , the 2024 Heisman Trophy winner known for playing both wide receiver and cornerback at Colorado, has been officially listed as a defensive back for the upcoming NFL Scouting Combine . Despite excelling on both offense and defense, this suggests that NFL scouts see his future primarily as a cornerback. However, he might still participate in some wide receiver drills.Travis Hunter had an incredible 2024 season at Colorado, earning multiple top awards for his exceptional play on both offense and defense. He became the first player to ever win both the Chuck Bednarik Award, given to the nation’s best defensive player, and the Fred Biletnikoff Award, which recognizes the top wide receiver. In addition, he won the Walter Camp Award as the national player of the year.Hunter played more snaps than any other player in college football, showing his versatility by excelling on both sides of the ball. Offensively, he caught 92 passes for 1,152 yards and 14 touchdowns, while defensively, he made 32 tackles and intercepted four passes. His all-around dominance led to him winning the Heisman Trophy, cementing his place as one of the most dynamic players in college football history.Travis Hunter has made it clear that he wants to play both wide receiver and cornerback in the NFL. However, being officially listed as a defensive back for the upcoming NFL Scouting Combine suggests that scouts and teams see his future primarily on defense. Despite this designation, he may still participate in wide receiver drills at the event.Hunter’s coach at Colorado ,Deion Sanders, is widely considered one of the greatest defensive backs in NFL history. Over his 14-year career, he earned eight Pro Bowl selections and recorded 53 interceptions. In addition to his defensive prowess, Sanders occasionally played wide receiver.In 1996 with the Dallas Cowboys, he caught 36 passes for 475 yards and one touchdown. Across his entire NFL career, he totaled 60 receptions for 784 yards and three touchdowns.Beyond football, Sanders was also a professional baseball player and a standout track athlete at Florida State University. His experience as a multi-sport athlete has shaped his coaching style, encouraging versatility in his players.Also Read: “I bleed for this city": Eagles GM Howie Roseman on getting hit by a beer can during Super Bowl LIX championship parade With Hunter’s elite skills as a cornerback, many NFL teams likely view him as a defensive standout first. He remains a projected top-five pick in the 2025 NFL Draft, and his performance at the combine will be crucial in determining how teams plan to use him at the next level.
Article Summary: Travis hunter has been officially listed as a defensive back for the upcoming nfl scouting combine. However, he might still participate in some wide receiver drills at the event. Hunter was the first player to ever win both the chuck bednarik award and the fred biletnikoff award as the top wide receiver.

Article Title: Pittsburgh Steelers Have Eyes On Los Angeles Rams' QB Matthew Stafford
Article Text:
(Image via Getty)

Anyway, the Pittsburgh Steelers may bid goodbye to Russell Wilson and go for Los Angeles Rams star quarterback and Kelly Stafford's husband, Matthew Stafford

Steelers QB Rumors Take Wild Turn

The Steelers may be preparing for another reset for their quarterback room, as both Russell Wilson and

Justin Fields

are looking for new deals. Things aren't exactly peachy in Pittsburgh right now. No one cares that Mike Tomlin hadn't registered a losing season in 18 straight years with the Steelers because Pittsburgh hasn't won a playoff game since 2016.

The Steelers have lost six straight postseason matchups and have allowed at least 28 points in all six of those losses. It's the longest such streak in NFL history! What's the best option for Pittsburgh at the quarterback? Trading up in the draft and hoping Cam Ward or Shedeur Sanders is the answer? Probably not. Do the Steelers want to enter the bidding war for Sam Darnold? Or take a flier on the 41-year-old

Aaron Rodgers

? Maybe Stafford is the best option- if he's made available.

Who will it be for the Pittsburgh Steelers? Jets QB Aaron Rodgers or Rams QB Matthew Stafford?

Would the Rams be crazy to trade QB Matthew Stafford? | NFL | THE FACILITY

Prior to Super Bowl week, and knowing things weren't perfect between Wilson and the team, I thought Wilson loomed as a tread-water type of option for the Steelers if other efforts failed in 2025.

But seeing the pro-Wilson narrative on the '25 pushed through? I don't think that's going over great inside that building. Meanwhile, the team would love to keep working with Fields. I just don't think they'll hand him the starting job. So the idea of Aaron Rodgers or Stafford could appeal to the Steelers. If that doesn't work, I think Pittsburgh looks at Fields with someone there to compete with him.

Los Angeles Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford is 37 years old, New York Jets quarterback is 41 years old, and Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Russell Wilson is 36 years old

Stephen A. Smith FLOATS the idea of Aaron Rodgers to the Steelers?! | First Take

I just think that we have kind of overrated Matthew Stafford a little bit since the Super Bowl victory. He's been good, but this year, he is starting to show his age. At the end of the day, if you're in Pittsburgh, you have to have a lot of things great around you for Matthew Stafford to have success. And I think that's where they're not standing right now.

If it's not QB Russell Wilson and QB Justin Fields, then is it QB Matthew Stafford for the Pittsburgh Steelers?

Evaluating potential trades for Matthew Stafford this offseason | Are these trades viable?

The Steelers need a quarterback and aren't within range of drafting a young signal-caller in what is, by all accounts, a thin draft class at the position. So, instead of trying to run it back with Russell Wilson and/or Justin Fields, they make a splash by adding Stafford to contend in the AFC North.

Also Read:

A lot has changed with the Pittsburgh Steelers . For one, they let linebacker Preston Smith go away after 4 months of playing in the regular season, and now their quarterback? The weather is changing so rapidly in Pittsburgh. We aren't able to catch the wind of it!Pittsburgh Steelers' star quarterback Russell Wilson will not return for the 2025 NFL season. Why? Because he's too old for them. Wilson ended the season with 9 wins and 7 losses. There's no performance consistency. And the list is long. There were some concerns about contract negotiations, too. Who knew? These would be Ciara 's NFL husband's last few days with the Pittsburgh Steelers.According to CBS Sports, "Sports Illustrated Insider Albert Breer thinks Matthew Stafford is the likely option for the Pittsburgh Steelers. He shared, "Someone from CBS Sports isn't happy about the whole Matthew Stafford for Pittsburgh Steelers idea. CBS Sports Analyst Emory Hunt shared, "CBS Sports Writer Tyler Sullivan shared, "Only time will tell where quarterback Russell Wilson will land, quarterback Justin Fields will fly, and where quarterback Matthew Stafford will settle. Till then, keep your fingers crossed! May the Pittsburgh Steelers finally get what they wished for.
Article Summary: Pittsburgh steelers' star quarterback russell wilson will not return for the 2025 nfl season. Wilson ended the season with 9 wins and 7 losses. The steelers have lost six straight postseason matchups and have allowed at least 28 points in all six of those losses.

NEW DELHI: The Board of Control for Cricket in India on Sunday unveiled a 74-match schedule for the 18th Indian Premier League that will be held across 13 venues, starting on March 22 with the blockbuster clash between defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders and Royal Challengers Bengaluru at Eden Gardens.This year, the iconic Eden Gardens will also host the final on May 25.The schedule, featuring 12 double-headers will see games being held over 65 days across 13 venues, with Dharamsala, Guwahati, and Visakhapatnam hosting a couple of IPL fixtures each.Dharamsala will serve as Punjab Kings' second home venue alongside Mullanpur (New Chandigarh), while Rajasthan Royals will make Guwahati their base in addition to Jaipur.Delhi Capitals will have Visakhapatnam as their second home venue and will start their league campaign there on March 24 against Lucknow Super Giants.The playoffs will be staged in Hyderabad and Kolkata after the league stage.Hyderabad will host Qualifier 1 and the Eliminator on May 20 and May 21, respectively, with the action shifting to Kolkata for Qualifier 2 on May 23.The IPL will continue with its two-group structure after the 2022 expansion to a 10-team format.Kolkata Knight Riders, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Rajasthan Royals, Chennai Super Kings, and Punjab Kings are in one group, while Sunrisers Hyderabad, Delhi Capitals, Gujarat Titans, Mumbai Indians, and Lucknow Super Giants are in the other.
Article Summary: Cnn.com will feature ireporter photos in a weekly travel snapshots gallery. Please submit your best shots of new zealand for next week. Visit cnn.com/travel next wednesday for a new gallery of snapshots. Ipl 2025 full schedule: chennai super kings vs mumbai indians, sunrisers hyderabad vs rajasthan royals, gujarat titans vs punjab kings, and kolkata knight riders vs royal challengers bengaluru.

Article Title: The 1972 Canada-Summit Series Team: Recognized as 'Man of the Year'
Article Text:
Image via HHOF

1972 Summit Series: A Defining Moment in Hockey



'Man of the Year' Award Recipient -- 1972 Team Canada Summit Series

NHL Alumni Celebrate the Legacy of the Summit Series of 1972



This team of 1972 officially called themselves the most defining moment in the history of hockey. Now, they have been chosen as the NHL Alumni Association 's 'Man of the Year'. Their victory over the Soviet Union under the circumstances of the Cold War transcended all borders previously alleged for sports. Stadium records will be permanent milestones in the culture of Canada. Members of Team Canada’s 1972 Summit Series team were honoured in Montreal on Friday. An award signifies more than achievement on the ice but also proves to be a legacy in the nation's identity of hockey and recognition worldwide.The Canada Summit Series constituted a watershed moment in hockey when history was enacted in 1972 through an eight-game series against the Soviet Union that transcended sports into cultural significance. As it began, the Soviets were surprisingly in the lead, but Team Canada was working toward victory, led by such legends as Phil Esposito, Paul Henderson , and Yvan Cournoyer. The last moments of Game 8 are unforgettable to this day, marked by Henderson's game-winning goal that ushered in the Canadian victory.“For many Canadians, the 1972 Summit Series remains one of the most iconic moments in our nation’s history. The team’s resilience, unity, and patriotism during their dramatic victory over the Soviet Union have solidified their place as national heroes in the hearts of Canadians from coast to coast to coast,” said Glenn Healy, president and executive director of the NHLAA in a statement.Where the win of Team Canada is a triumph of athletics, it became a celebration of national pride and the rallying point for the Canadians to unify and persist through a politically dire time. Their win is credited with establishing hockey in Canada and further cementing the game as a state of mind of Canadian identity.The NHL Alumni Association’s ‘Man of the Year’ Award is usually conferred upon those who are paragons of excellence both on the ice and off. By recognizing a team as a whole, the association is instead stressing the team spirit and historical importance of the 1972 squad this year.Glenn Healy, president of the NHLAA, commented, “The 1972 Summit Series team defined what it was to be a Canadian hockey player. From their grit, determination, and heart, they inspired generations of players and fans alike.” The role played by the team in cementing goodwill worldwide and promoting the game of hockey was also duly recognized.Also read: Why the NHL ditching its all-star game for international hockey could be the best move yet The 1972 Summit Series team’s victory has transcended time, ensuring forever a footnote in hockey history for them. This recognition by the NHL Alumni Association as 'Man of the Year' is a testimony to what they did not just on the ice, but also for Canada's very identity and the international recognition of the game. Their story continues to inspire generations, reminding contemporary audiences that true greatness is not only about winning, but also about the style, teamwork, and heart that characterize a true champion. As their 50th anniversary approaches, the Summit Series team remains an everlasting emblem for what it means to be a Canadian hockey legend.
Article Summary: Nhl alumni association honoured members of team canada's 1972 summit series team. The award signifies more than achievement on the ice but also proves to be a legacy in the nation's identity of hockey and recognition worldwide. The win is credited with establishing hockey in canada and further cementing the game as a state of mind of canadian identity.

Article Title: Will LeBron James play tonight in the NBA All-Star Game 2025? Latest update on the Los Angeles Lakers star's injury report (February 16, 2025)
Article Text:
LeBron James of the Lakers (Image via Adam Pantozzi/NBAE/Getty Images)

LeBron James

Los Angeles Lakers

NBA All-Star Game 2025

Is LeBron James playing tonight? (Image via Mark J. Terrill/ AP)

, thesuperstar and headliner of Shaq's OGs, was notably absent from the’s Saturday night festivities. The 21-time All-Star skipped the shootaround and players' press conference, sparking questions about his availability for Sunday's main event. However, ESPN's Dave McMenamin confirmed that James would join the All-Star weekend on Sunday, aligning with his pattern from the past two seasons.According to NBA Communications, LeBron James will hold a pre-game media session at 3:20 p.m. PT at Chase Center before suiting up for his record 21st All-Star Game. The Los Angeles Lakers forward has been relatively healthy this season, playing 48 out of 52 games and averaging 24.3 points, 7.7 rebounds, and 9.0 assists. His presence on Sunday will see him team up with fellow Team USA stars Kevin Durant and Steph Curry. LeBron James ' All-Star legacy is unmatched. Over his 20 previous appearances, he has averaged 21.7 points, 5.7 rebounds, and 5.7 assists per game. His career-high of 36 points came in the 2012 All-Star Game as a Miami Heat player. A three-time All-Star MVP (2006, 2008, 2018), James trails only Kobe Bryant and Bob Petit, who each won the award four times. Despite not winning the MVP in the last two seasons, James remains a central figure in the star-studded event.The NBA All-Star Game 2025 introduces a new format, with James leading Shaq's OGs against Candace's Rising Stars in the semifinals. If victorious, they will face either Kenny's Young Stars or Chuck's Global Stars in the championship round. Fans can catch the action on TNT, TBS, and TruTV, with NBA League Pass available for international viewers and those without cable access.The basketball world eagerly awaits LeBron James' 21st All-Star appearance andhis absence on Saturday night has only heightened anticipation for Sunday's showcase. With his health intact and his legacy secure, LeBron James remains a key player of the NBA All-Star Game 2025.Also read: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight at the NBA All-Star Game 2025? Latest update on the injury report of the Milwaukee Bucks star's injury report (February 16, 2025) Let us know in the comments below which team you are going to support tonight at the NBA All-Star Game 2025. Will it be LeBron James and Shaq’s OG or do you have someone else as your priority?
Article Summary: Lebron james was notably absent from the’s saturday night festivities. The 21-time all-star skipped the shootaround and players' press conference, sparking questions about his availability for sunday's main event. Espn's dave mcmenamin confirmed that james would join the all-stars on sunday, aligning with his pattern from the past two seasons.

Article Title: “So b**thurt”’: Derrick Henry gets brutally slammed for his controversial Super Bowl comments leaving fans divided
Article Text:
Image via Tommy Gilligan-Imagn Images

Derrick Henry’s Controversial Answer About Super Bowl LIX Has Divided His Fans



Derrick Henry on Lamar's MVP Case, Why He'd Never Join Chiefs w/ Micah Parsons | The Edge, S2E25

Derrick Henry Also Spoke About The Love He Has For His Current Team, The Baltimore Ravens



Derrick Henry, one of the most talented players in the Baltimore Ravens, recently appeared on Micah Parsons’ podcast, The Edge With Micah Parsons, and his controversial answers on NFL and Super Bowl has fans talking. A few days before the Super Bowl when Derrick Henry was asked which team he would be supporting in the Super Bowl, Derrick’s answer has pretty much divided his fans.When Micah Parsons asked Derrick Henry about his prediction for the Super Bowl, Derrick Henry said, “I want both of them to lose. I dont even care. I want both of them to lose. I dont care who wins. Honestly.”He continued, “I ain’t even playing”. His answer has divided his fans. While many believe he gave a fair answer considering his team, the Baltimore Ravens could not make it to the Super Bowl, other fans feel he has too much “hatred” in him.A fan took to X and wrote, “Damn. I love #22, but why does he have to be so b**thurt? The entire world (minus Chiefs fans) were rooting hard for Eagles. I'm elated they trashed the Chiefs”, while another fan wrote, “Ravens have become the biggest crybabies. Even edging out the Bills. Great job!!”A third fan wrote, “all that hate in his heart is why his beard is patchy”.However, many fans have also supported Derrick Henry’s point of view. A fan wrote, “True Raven. He need to stay the rest his career here in Baltimore. Dude was born a Raven but accidentally ended up in Tennessee to start his career. I hope all this heartbreak the last 2 years send the entire team in demon mode next year.”Another fan wrote, “Thats my KING 👑”, while a third user wrote, “Who doesn’t feel that way? We want 2 new competitors in the SB, this is a rematch basically of 2 years ago getting boring af”In the same podcast with Micah Parsons, The Edge With Micah Parsons, Derrick Henry has also spoken about his love for his current team, the Baltimore Ravens and how badly he wants to win a Super Bowl once in his career.Derrick Henry said, “Winning a Super Bowl: "I gotta have it. I need it. I'll be depressed if I don't get it. Please, Lord, right now”.The star player of the Baltimore Ravens started his career in NFL back in 2016 with the Tennessee Titans and stayed with the team until the 2023 season of the NFL. It is only in the 2024 season of the NFL that Derrick Henry signed a deal worth a whopping $16 million with the Baltimore Ravens.Also Read: Joe Burrow's picture with a new woman raises eyebrows, hinting at a relationship as fans troll Olivia Ponton
Article Summary: Derrick henry, one of the most talented players in the baltimore ravens, recently appeared on micah parsons’ podcast, the edge. He was asked which team he would be supporting in the super bowl. His answer has pretty much divided his fans.

Article Title: Auston Matthews' Girlfriend: Meet Emily Ruttledge, the Woman Behind the NHL Star
Article Text:
Source: Getty Images

Who is Auston Matthew's Girlfriend Emily Ruttledge?

What does Emily Ruttledge do for a living?

Source: LinkedIn

Also Read

US star icе hockеy playеr Auston Matthew has made a significant impact in the National Hockey League (NHL) as thе cеntеr player for the Toronto Maple Leafs . He has been associated with the team since he was first sеlеctеd in the 2016 NHL Entry Draft.In his first thrее sеasons, Auston established himself as onе of thе lеaguе's top goal scorеrs. However, the turning point in his career came, when Matthew dеbuted in the 2016-17 sеason, setting a new rеcord by scoring four goals in the first game.His outstanding pеrformancеs еarnеd him multiplе sеlеctions to thе NHL All-Star Gamеs, which made him one of thе brightеst stars in the league. With his rеmarkablе scoring abilities, Auston is considered to be one of the kеy players and is regarded as the alternate captain for thе Toronto Maplе Lеafs.Before the NHL, Matthews had a short stint playing for the ZSC Lions - Switzerland's national league. He even went on to win a Swiss Cup title. Apart from having a successful professional career in ice hockey, the player has recently grabbed the eye-balls of his fans and followers due to his personal life and long-time beau Emily Ruttlеdgе.Emily Ruttlеdgе is thе long-distancе girlfriеnd of NHL star Auston Matthеws. As per her LinkedIn profile, she accomplished her еducational journey by receiving a post-graduation degree in Clinical Psychology from Pepperdine University. Ruttledge graduated from Arizona State University in 2020 with a Bachelor's degree in Human Development and Family Studies.Alongsidе hеr studies, Emily also served as a research assistant at the university in 2022. Hеr imprеssivе academic background includes attending Pinnacle High School, followed by pursuing highеr еducation at Thе London School of Economics and Political Sciеncе (LSE) in 2019 and complеting coursеs at Harvard Businеss School Onlinе in 2021.Emily's commitment to academic excellence and personal development is highlighted by her еducation and her professional pursuits.Emily comes from an educated family, seeing her career and academic achievements. She is currently serving as a Primary Therapist at Lightfully Behavioral Health, providing high-acuity mental healthcare. Previously, she was a Research Assistant at Pepperdine University. Additionally, in 2021, she took on the role of Clinical Research Assistant at Children's Hospital Los Angeles (CHLA).Before working as a mental health practitioner, Emily worked full-time as a business analyst at Infosys, followed by an intеrnship at Goldman Sachs in Utah as a Privatе Wеalth Managеmеnt Opеrations Intеrn from May 2018 to August 2018.As per reports, Ruttledge is currently residing in Santa Monica, California, where she is said to be dating NHL athlete, Auston Matthews . However, not much is known about the duo's relationship, as they tend to keep themselves away from the public eye.
Article Summary: Emily ruttledge is the long-time girlfriend of nhl star auston matthew. She is currently serving as a primary therapist at lightfully behavioral health, providing high-acuity mental healthcare. As per her linkedin profile, she accomplished her post-graduation degree in clinical psychology from pepperdine university.

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings (PBKS) will kick off their IPL 2025 campaign against Gujarat Titans (GT) in Ahmedabad on March 25. The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has unveiled the full schedule for the season, which begins with defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) facing Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) at Eden Gardens on March 22.This edition of the tournament will feature 74 matches across 13 venues, including 12 double-headers. Afternoon games will start at 3:30 PM IST, while evening matches will commence at 7:30 PM IST.The tournament will conclude at Eden Gardens in Kolkata, where Qualifier 2 and the final will be held.Punjab Kings are still in pursuit of their maiden IPL title, having never won since the league's inception in 2008. Shreyas Iyer, who led KKR to their third IPL title in 2024, will captain PBKS this season, aiming to change the franchise's fortunes.
Article Summary: Punjab kings will kick off their ipl 2025 campaign against gujarat titans (gt) on march 25. The board of control for cricket in india (bcci) has unveiled the full schedule for the season, which begins with defending champions kolkata knight riders (kkr) at eden gardens on march 22.

NEW DELHI: The BCCI on Sunday announced the complete Indian Premier League 2025 schedule and last year's finalists Sunrisers Hyderabad will begin their campaign against Rajasthan Royals at Hyderabad's Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium on March 23.The tournament schedule shows SRH will play double-header matches against Lucknow Super Giants, Delhi Capitals, defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders, Gujarat Titans, and Mumbai Indians in the league stage.SRH, under Pat Cummins's leadership, were the runners-up in 2024 after losing to Kolkata Knight Riders in the final by eight wickets.The league phase will feature 70 matches, with each team playing 14 games.The playoffs are scheduled from May 20 to May 25.Hyderabad's Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium will host Qualifier 1 and the Eliminator on May 20 and 21.The tournament will conclude at Kolkata's Eden Gardens, which will host both Qualifier 2 and the final on May 25.
Article Summary: Ipl 2025 full schedule: sunrisers hyderabad vs. rajasthan royals, kolkata knight riders vs. gujarat titans, delhi capitals vs. chennai super kings. The ipl will be played in india between may and october. The league phase will feature 70 matches, with each team playing 14 games.

Article Title: Team India cause unusual frenzy in Dubai ahead of Champions Trophy
Article Text:
TimesofIndia.com in Dubai:

Indian cricket team lands in Dubai for Champions Trophy | Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Gautam Gambhir all spotted | Exclusive visuals

Poll What Are You Looking Forward to for India in the 2025 ICC Champions Trophy? Strategic and Innovative Gameplay Outstanding Teamwork and Collaboration

India’s squad for ICC Champions Trophy, 2025:

Late in the afternoon on February 15, an unusual frenzy gripped the business class arrivals lounge of the Dubai International Airport. The word had travelled that the Indian cricket team was going to land shortly and plenty of fans had assembled to catch a glimpse of their favourite superstars. The area which generally sees passengers quietly make their way to the fleet of luxury vehicles waiting outside was buzzing with activity.Security officials were working overdrive when the flight carrying the Men in Blue landed on the runway. Few luggage trolleys were used to cordon off the area and the intensity picked up when the local police directed everyone to vacate the lounge area and head to the parking lot outside. There were loud cheers when head coach Gautam Gambhir led the entourage to the team bus. Everyone - from Virat Kohli to Hardik Pandya to Shreyas Iyer - acknowledged the fans while boarding the team bus.When the players took their respective seats, the waiting fans kept looking inside because captain Rohit Sharma was yet to exit the building. And when he did, there were loud cheers for the Hitman who walked briskly to the waiting bus and even summoned the security official for some instructions. Did he forget something again? Eh, not quite sure but you never know! The bus left the airport and KL Rahul, who made his way out at least 20 minutes after the team, took a separate car to the team hotel.Business as usual resumed after that and the usual calm was restored to the business class arrivals lounge. The ICC Champions Trophy 's first match in Dubai is still some days away and the buzz has naturally been missing in the city. And quite understandably so. Only India would be parked here because the rest of the teams will play their matches in Pakistan, the official hosts of the tournament. The teams allotted fixtures vs India will travel to Dubai and then head back as per the hybrid arrangement okayed by the International Cricket Council (ICC).The tournament gets underway on February 19 with India playing their opening match vs Bangladesh in Dubai on February 20. The large section of Bangladeshis residing here are excited to see their heroes in action and sound very optimistic on their chances too. The only question on their lips is "when will the Bangladesh team land?" and they certainly sound confident of taking a Jasprit Bumrah-less India down in their tournament opener."I support Bangladesh and want them to win. It will be difficult but easier than before because Jasprit Bumrah , the dangerman, is not here. And we have good pacers. So it will not be an easy game for India as pacers do well in Dubai," said a cab driver who makes multiple trips to the airport in a day."Pakistan is 50-50. They can do anything on their day but when it's not their day, they are a difficult team to even watch on TV (laughs)," he added on the hosts' chances.Pakistan, the defending champions, will put their credentials to the test in the opener against New Zealand in Karachi.Rohit Sharma (Captain), Shubman Gill (Vice-captain), Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul (WK), Rishabh Pant (WK), Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Washington Sundar, Kuldeep Yadav, Harshit Rana, Mohd. Shami, Arshdeep Singh, Ravindra Jadeja, Varun Chakaravarthy.
Article Summary: Indian cricket team lands in dubai for champions trophy. Rohit sharma, virat kohli, gautam gambhir all spotted. Icc champions trophy gets underway on february 19. India play their opening match vs bangladesh in dubai on february 20.

NEW DELHI: The Board of Control for Cricket in India on Sunday released the schedule for IPL 2025, with matches set to begin from March 22.The Delhi Capitals will face Lucknow Super Giants in their opening match at Vishakhapatnam on March 24.Delhi Capitals concluded the previous season in sixth position, accumulating 14 points from 14 matches.The team made significant acquisitions during the auction last year, securing KL Rahul for 14 crore and Australian fast bowler Mitchell Starc for 11.75 crore.The league phase will feature 14 matches per team, totaling 70 matches.The playoff matches are scheduled from May 20 to May 25.Hyderabad's Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium will host Qualifier 1 and the Eliminator on May 20 and 21 respectively.The tournament will wrap up at Eden Gardens in Kolkata, where Qualifier 2 and the final match will be played.
Article Summary: The board of control for cricket in india on sunday released the schedule for ipl 2025. The delhi capitals will face lucknow super giants in their opening match at vishakhapatnam on march 24. The league phase will feature 14 matches per team, totaling 70 matches. The playoff matches are scheduled from may 20 to may 25.
